Title: Chronic PPI Use Weakens Bones, but Only in Men
Teaser: A study found a significant relationship between chronic proton pump inhibitor use and lower trabecular bone scores and bone mineral density in males, but not females.

Title: Mastitis in Older Women Linked to Subsequent Breast Cancer
Teaser: Their risk is increased by 73% in a large German retrospective cohort study.

Title: Abnormal HR Shifts Tied to Risk for Death in Diabetes
Teaser: A reduction in 24-hour heart rate variations was linked to twice the risk for long-term cardiovascular death, while the inability to reduce heart rate during sleep was linked to 39% increased risk.

Title: AI-Based Breast Cancer Screening Will Save Lives & Money
Teaser: Most benefit is from risk-stratified screening, with annual screening for high-risk individuals to every 6 years for those at lowest risk.

Title: Demographics Linked to Worse Access to Cardiac Surgery
Teaser: Women, Black people, and poor people were less likely to undergo major heart surgery.

Title: Monthly Semaglutide Goal: The End of Daily Pills?
Teaser: An injectable hydrogel provided a sustained release of semaglutide for 1 month in rats, according to preclinical testing of an experimental longer-acting formulation.

Title: Join Dr Julie Oliver and the Primary Care Women’s Health Forum at Guidelines Live 2024
Teaser: In anticipation of Guidelines Live 2024, the PCWHF provides a taster of its sessions in the Women’s Health Stream, which will address key issues around menopause and HRT

Title: Rheumatoid Arthritis: Whole-Food Diet May Be Protective
Teaser: The more ultra-processed foods a person consumed, the higher their risk for the inflammatory autoimmune disease.
